trans-unit.source: When you request the restore of replicated data through the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tina_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> will automatically restore from the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with the lowest network latency, which could be either the replication source or target <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: When you request the restore of replicated data through the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tina_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> will automatically restore from the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> with the lowest network latency, which could be either the replication source or target <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Lorsque vous demandez la restauration de données répliquées via le<MadCap:variable name="ALN.tina_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> restaurera automatiquement à partir du <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> avec la latence réseau la plus faible, qui peut être la source ou la cible de la réplication <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: If you request a restore before the replication is finished and the fastest <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is still being replicated, then <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> selects the next fastest <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> containing the entire stream to be restored.

seg-source.mrk: If you request a restore before the replication is finished and the fastest <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> is still being replicated, then <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> selects the next fastest <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> containing the entire stream to be restored.

target.mrk: Si vous demandez une restauration avant la fin de la réplication et que le <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> le plus rapide est toujours en cours de réplication, <MadCap:variable name="ALN.tn" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> sélectionne le prochain <MadCap:variable name="ALN.hys_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> le plus rapide contenant le flux entier à restaurer.
